message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I'm willing to make a reasonable offer, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Thanks for the offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $125. It's a great compromise, if I do say so myself!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more like $120. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I'm still a bit above the $115 I offered earlier.

I understand where you're coming from, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer you the product for $125, but I need to get at least $125 for it. It's my minimum price, and I'm not willing to go any lower. What do you think?
I understand that $125 is your minimum price, but I'm still a bit above that. I'm willing to meet you at $123. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer you the product for $124. It's the best I can do, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $122. I think that's a fair price for both of us.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll offer you the product for $121. It's the best I can do, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value. What do you think?
